capsules_submitted.utterance: I've been noticing that Harry has this weird mark on his forehead. It's like a lightning bolt or something, and it's really sharp. I'm pretty sure he got into some kind of trouble recently, because this mark looks like it was made by a knife.

I've seen some pretty intense injuries in my time, but that lightning-shaped cut on Harry's forehead is something else. I'm not sure what happened to him, but it's clear he was in a world of trouble. The certainty level on this one is high - I'm almost positive I saw the whole thing go down.

I've seen that before, it's a pretty rare condition. I'm not sure what the chances are of someone having a lightning-shaped injury on their forehead, but it's definitely something that would be noticed by medical professionals.
